## About this illustration 

This logo was created for the first UVP User Meeting organised at the Laboratoire d’Océanographie de Villefranche, Villefranche-sur-Mer, France and online, on the 15th and 16th September 2022.
The visual codes from the laboratory's logo were kept in mind to obtain this logo.
